description:
You can pick up the Play Foam Puzzle Mats, 9-pc. Packs at my affiliated link: http://shrsl.com/ugd2

Grab the storage boxes here at my Amazon affiliated link: https://amzn.to/2EbbaiC

For more information on DM crafting visit my website:
http://www.thedmscraft.com/

Learn to make cheap and easy dungeon tiles for all your miniature 28mm tabletop games such as Dungeons and Dragons and Pathfinder. This easy craft will save you valuable time, so you have more hours to play the games you love. The materials are also cheap and easy to obtain so this project won’t break your budget. Bring a few crafting supplies and sit down with DM Scotty to begin your DIY crafting adventure. You can find the tools you need at my website ( http://www.thedmscraft.com/ ). So grab your gluegun and Go Forth and Craft.

Scotty’s favorite glue gun (affiliated link): http://amzn.to/2gYKRhV

The Tabletop Crafters Guild Site:
http://www.tabletopcraftersguild.com/

Become a friend to the Craft and help me bring more content to the community by joining my Patreon. You will have access to exclusive DM Scotty content:  https://www.patreon.com/theDMsCraft?ty=h

Join The Tabletop Crafters Guild Facebook group for more crafts and camaraderie: 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/dmscottyscraftsngames/

Twitter: @TheDMsCraft

Info for the Crafting Muse:
On Youtube- https://www.youtube.com/TheCraftingMuse
Facebook Group- https://www.facebook.com/groups/thecr...
Website- http://www.thecraftingmuse.com/
On Instagram- https://www.instagram.com/_the_crafti...
@TheCraftingMuse on Twitter- https://twitter.com/TheCraftingMuse
title: Puzzlescapes / Easy to Make D&D Tiles (Dm Scotty's Tilescapes #36)
